mapper.sql: SELECT B.CLSFN_SYST_ID clsfnSystId , A.COURSE_ID courseId , B.SORT_SEQ sortSeq , A.FMY_SITE_DS_CD fmySiteDsCd

FROM A INNER JOIN EBSJHS.TB_LMS_CLSFN_SYST_COURSE_RL B ON B.COURSE_ID = A.COURSE_ID INNER JOIN ( SELECT CLSFN_SYST_ID , CLSFN_SYST_NM FROM EBSJHS.TB_G_CLSFN_SYST TGCS WHERE CLSFN_SYST_PHS >= 3 AND CLSFN_SYST_ID IN ( WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS ( SELECT A.CLSFN_SYST_ID , A.CLSFN_SYST_NM FROM EBSJHS.TB_G_CLSFN_SYST A WHERE A.CLSFN_SYST_ID IN (61000001, 61001520) UNION ALL SELECT B.CLSFN_SYST_ID , B.CLSFN_SYST_NM FROM EBSJHS.TB_G_CLSFN_SYST B , CTE C WHERE B.HGRNK_CLSFN_SYST_ID = C.CLSFN_SYST_ID ) SELECT CLSFN_SYST_ID FROM CTE ) UNION ALL SELECT CLSFN_SYST_ID , CLSFN_SYST_NM FROM EBSJHS.TB_G_CLSFN_SYST TGCS WHERE CLSFN_SYST_PHS >= 2 AND CLSFN_SYST_ID IN ( WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS ( SELECT A.CLSFN_SYST_ID , A.CLSFN_SYST_NM FROM EBSJHS.TB_G_CLSFN_SYST A WHERE A.CLSFN_SYST_ID IN (64200000, 64100000) UNION ALL SELECT B.CLSFN_SYST_ID , B.CLSFN_SYST_NM FROM EBSJHS.TB_G_CLSFN_SYST B , CTE C WHERE B.HGRNK_CLSFN_SYST_ID = C.CLSFN_SYST_ID ) SELECT CLSFN_SYST_ID FROM CTE ) ) C ON C.CLSFN_SYST_ID = B.CLSFN_SYST_ID
AND IF(B.DELT_YN IS NULL OR B.DELT_YN = '', 'N', B.DELT_YN) = 'N'
AND IF(B.DELT_YN IS NULL OR B.DELT_YN = '', 'N', B.DELT_YN) = 'Y'
AND B.CRTN_DTM >= CONCAT(#{date}, '000000') AND B.CRTN_DTM <= CONCAT(#{date}, '235959')
AND B.LST_CHNG_DTM >= CONCAT(#{date}, '000000') AND B.LST_CHNG_DTM <= CONCAT(#{date}, '235959')
